refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;RT audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if RT audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o ATSsinnoi.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1 ; "beats.ats" is created by atsa
ktime line 0, p3, 2 knzfade expon 0.001, p3, 2 aout ATSsinnoi ktime, 1, knzfade, 1, "beats.ats", 150 outs aout*2, aout*2 ;amplify some more endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 2 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
